title: About the rewards program soon. What if you have a new account but are not 30 yet?
body: Will you still be able to get the rewards from under your level or only those you haven't gotten to yet?

replies.body: I'm not really sure what you mean by a rewards program.  Do you mean [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)?  Mastery chests are available for any level, as long as you haven't had any behavioral infractions from the Instant feedback System.  Let me know if that clears things up!
What rewards program are you talking about? I don't remember hearing anything about NA getting a rewards program.
